title: “Metafining” of nerolidol with a Grubbs-Hoveyda catalyst to generate high-performance sustainable aviation fuels
content:
Sustainable Energy Fuels, 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4SE00487F, Paper
C. Luke Keller, Christopher J. Walkling, Derek D. Zhang, Benjamin G. Harvey
trans-Nerolidol was converted into high-performance sustainable aviation fuel by a combination of ring-closing olefin metathesis, dehydration, and hydrogenation. The fuels exhibited exceptional gravimetic energy density and low viscosity.
To cite this article before page numbers are assigned, use the DOI form of citation above.
